titleStmt.title: The vvedding As it was lately acted by her Maiesties Seruants, at the Phenix in Drury Lane. Written by Iames Shirley, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Iohn Groue, and are to be sold at his shop at Furniualls Inne Gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Inlaid; A4 reversed in binding; quire K misbound 1,3,2,4.

place.placeName: his shop at Furniualls Inne Gate in Holborne
